Project.Brief history of your project and organi: At Rebel Iron, we focus on providing managed infrastructure that's ideal for AI and Web3 applications. We pride ourselves on delivering solutions that are decentralized, secure, and efficient, meeting the needs of institutions and enterprises worldwide. Our expertise lies in leveraging cutting-edge technology to support demanding AI workloads, making us adept at handling large-scale data storage projects on platforms like Filecoin.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: The data we're storing has been carefully scraped from the internet, focusing on specific topics that our clients are interested in for AI training. Typically includes scrapped data from Reddit, Wiki, and google search results.
